ws.rocket.path.builder

Class TreeNodeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.rocket.path.builder.TreeNodeBuilder

  • public final class TreeNodeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder version for creating TreeNodes. Since the latter requires node children up front, it's not very convenient for constructing a tree. The builder delays the node creation until build() is called.

    Builder supports a callback which is called with every node key and value. The callback has complete power to override the provided value, to initialize it with global configuration, etc. Call-backs, however, are not required for constructing a tree.

    So that the information about a node's children could be kept close to the node, node values may implement TreeNodeBuilderAware to provide a callback method. The method is executed when the value object reaches the builder. In the callback, the children of the containing node can be declared using the provided instance of TreeNodeBuilder for that particular TreeNode.

    Child TreeNodes are created immediately when constructor or addChild(Object, Object) is called. The TreeNode currently being built is constructed when build() is called. The node will have the child TreeNodes that have been defined in the builder (with the same order).

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreeNodeBuilder

        public TreeNodeBuilder()
        Creates a new builder. The created TreeNode won't have neither key nor value.

      • TreeNodeBuilder

        public TreeNodeBuilder(TreeNodeCallback callback)
        Creates a new builder. The created TreeNode won't have neither key nor value unless the callback overrides them.
        Parameters:
        callback - Optional callback which is called with every key and value in the created tree.

      • TreeNodeBuilder

        public TreeNodeBuilder(java.lang.Object key,
               java.lang.Object value)
        Creates a new builder. The created TreeNode will have given key and value pair.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the TreeNode being created.
        value - The value for the TreeNode being created.

      • TreeNodeBuilder

        public TreeNodeBuilder(java.lang.Object key,
               java.lang.Object value,
               TreeNodeCallback callback)
        Creates a new builder. The created TreeNode will have given key and value pair unless the callback overrides them.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the TreeNode being created.
        value - The value for the TreeNode being created.
        callback - Optional callback which is called with every key and value in the created tree.

    • Method Detail

      • addChild

        public TreeNodeBuilder addChild(java.lang.Object key,
                       java.lang.Object value)
        Adds a child TreeNode to the current node. The child node will have given key and value unless a callback has been defined in the builder which overrides them.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the TreeNode being created.
        value - The value for the TreeNode being created.
        Returns:
        The current instance of builder.

      • addChild

        public TreeNodeBuilder addChild(TreeNode node)
        Adds a child TreeNode to the current node. The node will be ignored if it's null. The node will be added as-is. The node won't be inspected nor altered.
        Parameters:
        node - The child node to add.
        Returns:
        The current instance of builder.

      • build

        public TreeNode build()
        Constructs a TreeNode with key, value, and TreeNode children available to this builder.
        Returns:
        The created TreeNode.
